subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush, Olmert to talk about reviving peace initiative

06/19/07 08:13 AM, EDT
The U.S. decision to end an economic and political embargo on the Palestinians increased pressure for a reciprocal move from Israel as the Bush administration hoped to improve the chances for peace.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
'Signing statements' add presidential spin to new laws

06/19/07 08:01 AM, EDT
The Bush administration sometimes fails to follow all provisions of laws after President Bush attaches "signing statements" meant to interpret or restrict the legislation, congressional examiners say.
FULL STORY
